contentrichtext.text: [[File:Joiner AR 10 City Hall.jpg|thumb|Joiner City Hall]] {{Infobox settlement |official_name = Joiner, Arkansas |settlement_type = [[City]] |image_skyline = |imagesize = |image_caption = |image_seal = |image_map = Mississippi_County_Arkansas_Incorporated_and_Unincorporated_areas_Joiner_Highlighted.svg |mapsize = 250px |map_caption = Location in [[Mississippi County, Arkansas|Mississippi County]] and the state of [[Arkansas]] |image_map1 = |mapsize1 = |map_caption1 = |subdivision_type = [[List of countries|Country]] |subdivision_type1 = [[Political divisions of the United States|State]] |subdivision_type2 = [[List of counties in Arkansas|County]] |subdivision_name = [[United States]] |subdivision_name1 = [[Arkansas]] |subdivision_name2 = [[Mississippi County, Arkansas|Mississippi]] |government_type = |leader_title = |leader_name = |established_date = |area_magnitude = |area_total_km2 = 0.8 |area_total_sq_mi = 0.3 |area_land_km2 = 0.8 |area_land_sq_mi = 0.3 |area_water_km2 = 0 |area_water_sq_mi = 0 |elevation_ft = 233 |elevation_m = 71 |population_as_of = 2000 |population_footnotes = |population_total = 540 |population_metro = |population_density_km2 = 675 |population_density_sq_mi = 1800 |timezone = [[North American Central Time Zone|Central (CST)]] |utc_offset = -6 |coordinates_display = inline,title |coordinates_type = region:US_type:city |latd = 35 |latm = 30 |lats = 26 |latNS = N |longd = 90 |longm = 9 |longs = 1 |longEW = W |timezone_DST = CDT |utc_offset_DST = -5 |postal_code_type = [[ZIP code]] |postal_code = 72350 |area_code = [[Area code 870|870]] |blank_name = [[Federal Information Processing Standard|FIPS code]] |blank_info = 05-35650 |blank1_name = [[Geographic Names Information System|GNIS]] feature ID |blank1_info = 0057996 |footnotes = |website = }} '''Joiner''' is a city in [[Mississippi County, Arkansas|Mississippi County]], [[Arkansas]], [[United States]]. The population was 540 at the [[United States Census, 2000|2000 census]]. Joiner was the birthplace of record company executive [[Al Bennett]], for whom the character Alvin of [[Alvin and the Chipmunks]] was named. ==Geography== Joiner is located at {{coord|35|30|26|N|90|9|1|W|type:city}} (35.507345, -90.150245){{GR|1}}. According to the [[United States Census Bureau]], the city has a total area of {{convert|0.3|sqmi|km2}}, all land. ==Demographics== As of the [[census]]{{GR|2}} of 2000, there were 540 people, 197 households, and 139 families residing in the city. The [[population density]] was 1,860.0 people per square mile (718.9/km²). There were 223 housing units at an average density of 768.1/sq mi (296.9/km²). The racial makeup of the city was 52.78% [[Race (United States Census)|White]], 45.93% [[Race (United States Census)|Black]] or [[Race (United States Census)|African American]], 0.37% from [[Race (United States Census)|other races]], and 0.93% from two or more races. 0.74% of the population were [[Race (United States Census)|Hispanic]] or [[Race (United States Census)|Latino]] of any race. There were 197 households out of which 37.1% had children under the age of 18 living with them, 39.1% were [[Marriage|married couples]] living together, 26.4% had a female householder with no husband present, and 29.4% were non-families. 25.4% of all households were made up of individuals and 11.7% had someone living alone who was 65 years of age or older. The average household size was 2.74 and the average family size was 3.29. In the city the population was spread out with 29.8% under the age of 18, 12.0% from 18 to 24, 23.5% from 25 to 44, 21.9% from 45 to 64, and 12.8% who were 65 years of age or older. The median age was 33 years. For every 100 females there were 80.0 males. For every 100 females age 18 and over, there were 72.3 males. The median income for a household in the city was $26,875, and the median income for a family was $30,000. Males had a median income of $28,750 versus $20,208 for females. The [[per capita income]] for the city was $10,454. About 27.7% of families and 27.5% of the population were below the [[poverty line]], including 35.3% of those under age 18 and 23.4% of those age 65 or over. ==References== {{commons category}} <references /> {{Mississippi County, Arkansas}} [[Category:Cities in Arkansas]] [[Category:Populated places in Mississippi County, Arkansas]]
